definition: steady as Mt Tai/as safe as houses
Mt Tai 泰山[Tai4 Shan1] in Shandong/abbr. for Thailand
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Your lack of routine upsets this steady sign.
sentences.chinese: 你的不守規矩會讓這個穩如泰山的星座苦惱不安。

sentences.english: Is your overall Investment Portfolio ALL Weather Proof as well?
sentences.chinese: 是你的整體投資組合是否也是穩如泰山？

sentences.english: So long as no problems arise in those two bodies, China will be as stable as Mount Tai.
sentences.chinese: 只要這個環節不發生問題，中國就穩如泰山。

sentences.english: As long as you don't betray me, I'll do whatever you ask me to (do).
sentences.chinese: 只要這個環節不發生問題，中國就穩如泰山。

definition: peer competition/to function as rivals/to make claims as an equal
to exhaust one's thoughts and ingenuity (idiom); to think sth through thoroughly/to rack one's brains/to leave no stone unturned
to run a newspaper/to publish a newspaper
Guangdong embroidery, one of the four major traditional styles of Chinese embroidery (the other three being 蘇繡|苏绣[Su1 xiu4], 湘繡|湘绣[Xiang1 xiu4] and 蜀繡|蜀绣[Shu3 xiu4])
Lingdong district of Shuangyashan city 雙鴨山|双鸭山[Shuang1 ya1 shan1], Heilongjiang
shanshui poetry, genre of Classical Chinese poetry
variant of 模擬|模拟[mo2 ni3]
after hard work and numerous revisions (idiom)/the vicissitudes of life
